title: ISic000549. I.Sicily inscription 000549
body:
Facsimile Images

1ULPIOSEVERO
2NAR[..]TUS
3EQSINGAUGTUR
4BUSTURONISVIXANXXXVIIID[---]
5MANSUETUSETTITUS
6HBMF

Apparatus criticus

Text: CIL

English translation

To Ulpius Severus of the Naristi [= Varisci], personal bodyguard of the Emperor, of the company of Busturonius, [who] lived for 38 years D[...?]. Mansuetus and Titus, his heirs, built this for this well deserving man

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7290 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Manganaro 1988 40 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
